description: Searches for UserIDs within a collection based on a FaceId or UserId. This API can be used to find the closest UserID (with a highest similarity) to associate a face. The request must be provided with either FaceId or UserId. The operation returns an array of UserID that match the FaceId or UserId, ordered by similarity score with the highest similarity first.

parameters.name: CollectionId
parameters.description: The ID of an existing collection containing the UserID, used with a UserId or FaceId. If a FaceId is provided, UserId isn't required to be present in the Collection.

nested_items.name: UserMatches
nested_items.description: An array of UserMatch objects that matched the input face along with the confidence in the match. Array will be empty if there are no matches.

nested_items.name: UserId
nested_items.description: A provided ID for the UserID. Unique within the collection.

nested_items.name: UserStatus
nested_items.description: The status of the user matched to a provided FaceID.

nested_items.name: FaceModelVersion
nested_items.description: Version number of the face detection model associated with the input CollectionId.

nested_items.name: SearchedFace
nested_items.description: Contains the ID of a face that was used to search for matches in a collection.

nested_items.name: FaceId
nested_items.description: Unique identifier assigned to the face.

nested_items.name: SearchedUser
nested_items.description: Contains the ID of the UserID that was used to search for matches in a collection.

nested_items.name: UserId
nested_items.description: A provided ID for the UserID. Unique within the collection.
